name: IT201_Project01_Jennifer_Medrano
description:
This project is a beta game for "avoid the enemies". The player must avoid all enemies in green before they come to life (This will be introduced later on). The player is slow and sensitive to the sun. He/she will be able to create temporary clouds as protection. 

The Project includes the following features;

 1. Display 3D clouds will appear when left clicked  2. Display mouse position

3. User is able to change cloud color 4. Clouds will auto destroy after 3.5 seconds.
